title: The Future of Defense (and a personal history)
description:
Mina talks to Coach Vass of the Make Defense Great Again podcast about the changing nature of defense in the NFL. Then Roger Bennett stops by to discuss his new book and his fealty to the Chicago Bears.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
